front.title: UTRAN Iuant interface: General aspects and principles
front.abstract: This document is an introduction to the TSG RAN TS 25.46x series of UMTS Technical Specifications that define the Iuant Interface. The logical Iuant interface is a Node B internal interface between the implementation specific O&M function and the Remote Electrical Tilting (RET) Antenna Control unit function of the Node B.
